application

Class ContentCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.ContentCreator

  • public class ContentCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Andrew

    This class holds the instances of the Player and Points classes and an instance of a GridPane So as to hold the content and to create the initial, score board and create content scenes for the game.

    • Method Detail

      • createContent

        protected javafx.scene.Parent createContent()
        This method is what holds the scene for the game. Creates an Animation timer that in puts the game logic, via the instance of the class GameLoop loop. Also fills the scene with enemy sprites, with the loop.nextLevel();
        Returns:
        root, with updates

      • createInitial

        protected javafx.scene.Parent createInitial()

        Creates the initial scene used to take user inputs and allow user to start game

        Parameters:
        HBox - paneplayer1, holds player input text and prompt
        HBox - paneplayer2, holds player input text and prompt
        Button - btnSubmit, creates a new instance of the class NewScene using the GridPane root.
        Button - btnAddName, generates a file called points.txt and adds user text inputs to the file
        Button - btnScoreBoard, generate scoreboard display for user.
        Returns:
        root, with updates

      • createScoreBoard

        public javafx.scene.Parent createScoreBoard()
        Displays player scores and allwos user to play a new game
        Parameters:
        Text - text, a Text which is used to display the players scores
        Button - btnPlayAgain, starts a new game
        Returns:
        root, with updates

      • gameOverText

        private void gameOverText()
        Generates the game over text to be displayed and adds it to the GridPane root
